mapper.select: select id, user_name, status, ip, create_by, create_time, last_update_by, last_update_time from sys_login_log where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_login_log(user_name, status, ip, create_by, create_time, last_update_by, last_update_time) values (#{userName}, #{status}, #{ip}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{lastUpdateBy}, #{lastUpdateTime})

insert into sys_login_log(user_name, status, ip, create_by, create_time, last_update_by, last_update_time) values
(#{entity.userName}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.ip}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.lastUpdateBy}, #{entity.lastUpdateTime})

insert into sys_login_log(user_name, status, ip, create_by, create_time, last_update_by, last_update_time) values
(#{entity.userName}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.ip}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.lastUpdateBy}, #{entity.lastUpdateTime})
on duplicate key update user_name = values(user_name), status = values(status), ip = values(ip), create_by = values(create_by), create_time = values(create_time), last_update_by = values(last_update_by), last_update_time = values(last_update_time)
mapper.update:
update sys_login_log
user_name = #{userName},
status = #{status},
ip = #{ip},
create_by = #{createBy},
create_time = #{createTime},
last_update_by = #{lastUpdateBy},
last_update_time = #{lastUpdateTime},
where id = #{id}
